title: Remove all files in preparation for publish bot
External admission webhook for validating CSINodeInfo object
body:
The current scheme of validating CSINodeInfo using OpenAPI schema validation as part of the CRD spec misses some validation cases, such as enforcing map semantics of `CSIDrivers` field and set semantics of `TopologyKeys`. Consider adding an external admission webhook to do this validation. This overlaps with the work around CRD installation, as we need a way to automatically install the admission webhook.

/cc @ddebroy @saad-ali

title: Update embargo doc link in SECURITY_CONTACTS and change PST to PSC
